Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Louise Churchill
Reviews.Content: I ignored poor reviews of this phone and bought it anyway.  It was a huge mistake.  I had the phone only a few months when the flimsy plastic battery cover began falling off.  I taped the cover back on and figured I would live with it.  A few months later the phone began to feel unstable when opened.  Earlier this week the entire top of the phone (screen portion) snapped off when I opened it to make a call.  The phone is less than a year old and was not dropped or exposed to anything more than normal wear and tear.  I have replaced it with my old standby the Pebl U6--a heavier, but much more durable phone.  Do not waste your money on such a flimsy phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: H. Dieterich "HJD"
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone... Holds music too (you'll need a Micro SD card).. superior sound crystal clear...Nice size... not too small. has OLED outside screen. Bluetooth.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Ultra-chic flip phone with cool, rounded design; 2-megapixel camera/camcorder
Bluetooth stereo music; digital audio/video player; MicroSD memory expansion; organizer
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 350 hours (14+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola PEBL U9 Unlocked Phone with QuadBand GSM, Bluetooth and Camera--International Version with No Warranty (Graphite Black)
